title: Guardian Spirit of the Waters
medium: Various charcoals, with touches of black chalk, stumping, erasing, incising, and subtractive sponge work, heightened with traces of white chalk, on cream wove paper altered to a golden tone
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. David Adler Collection

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of various charcoals, with touches of black chalk, stumping, erasing, incising, and subtractive sponge work, heightened with traces of white chalk, on cream wove paper altered to a golden tone.
